Key Match Events: Dinesh Karthik scored his first half-century in T20I, scoring it in India's biggest win over South Africa
South Africa's lowest total in T20Is: 87
Lungi Ngidi took career-best figures of 4-18
Avesh Khan took 4 wickets in the match
Pre-Game Insights: Rishabh Pant has struggled with the bat in the series so far
Bavuma retired hurt with an elbow injury and could not continue
Post-Match Reflections: Dinesh Karthik expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their series
Miscellaneous Highlights: On a surface with uneven bounce, most of India's line-up struggled until Hardik and Karthik came together
Only three of South Africa's batters got into double figures
Heinrich Klaasen has struggled against Yuzvendra Chahal in their recent encounters
